title: Xystus Discography 2004-2008 ak
description:
Xystus Discography 2004-2008 ak

Xystus is a Dutch progressive metal band from Den Bosch,

The band was formed in 1999 by drummer and keyboardist Ivo van Dijk and singer and guitarist Bas Dolmans. The first album was released under the name Receiving Tomorrow im Jahr 2004.  The publication was followed by appearances in the Netherlands together with Epica, Kamelot and Autumn. This was followed by an international tour with Epica Europe. In 2007 the second album followed called Surreal. During the release, the band was already working on the next album Equilibrio that a "rock opera" performing as specified band. She was played live in Utrecht before about 4,000 spectators. The band was supported by an orchestra and there were guest musicians like Simone Simons (Epica), George Oosthoek (ex-Orphanage), Michelle Splietelhof (Der Schuh des Manitu) und John Vooijs (Tarzan)

The band plays classical Progressive Metal, which also symphonic elements are interspersed. The band is compared with other groups such as Kamelot, Ayreon and Savatage.

Albums
mp3

2004: Receiving Tomorrow (Album, The Electric Co.)256ak
2007: Surreal (Album, The Electric Co.) 320ak
2008: Equilibrio (Album, Sensory Records)320ak


Players

Ivo van Dijk - Drums, Keyboard

Bas Dolmans - Guitar,Vocals
 
Bob Wijtsma - Bass
